full_threads.body:
Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wpperk.com


Begin forwarded message:

From: "O'Brien, Melinda" <Melinda.OBrien@phonak.com>
Subject: RE: CROS P launch 25 October 2021
Date: 20 October 2021 at 10:04:43 pm AEDT
To: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>

Hi Heath,

Looking good!

A couple of updates:

Professional brochures

Reposition to:
  1. Product information Phonak CROS P
  2. Phonak Paradise RIC portfolio
  3. Real ear measurement
  4. At A Glance
Move Factsheets x 3 to own listing below consumer brochures, with the heading: Factsheets

Update wording and structure across 3 lines to:
Phonak CROS P
real ear measurement
Verification Guide

Phonak CROS P
At A Glance

Website & social media
Can you please move the 'Download' button down to the same level as the other buttons.

Thanks,

Melinda

From: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Tuesday, 19 October 2021 6:09 PM
To: O'Brien, Melinda <Melinda.OBrien@phonak.com>
Subject: Re: CROS P launch 25 October 2021

EXTERNAL MAIL

Hi Melinda,

Confirming the videos have been updated.

Thanks,

Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au


On 19 Oct 2021, at 9:20 am, O'Brien, Melinda <Melinda.OBrien@phonak.com> wrote:

Hi Heath,
No problems.
Please see links below:
CROS P Phonak 5
https://sonova.showpad.com/share/95X3fYfRMms65Zv2jpR6i
CROS P In Clinic
https://sonova.showpad.com/share/bWzCr1joa6aCjteNQH4d3
Regards,
Melinda
From: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Monday, 18 October 2021 7:36 PM
To: O'Brien, Melinda <Melinda.OBrien@phonak.com>
Subject: Re: CROS P launch 25 October 2021
EXTERNAL MAIL
Hi Melinda,
Confirming we have made the below updates.
With the Videos request, these would need to be separated out in Showpad first.
Is that possible?
Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au



On 18 Oct 2021, at 7:03 am, O'Brien, Melinda <Melinda.OBrien@phonak.com> wrote:
Hi Heath,
Thanks for compiling, looks good. Can you please update a few items below:
Professional brochures
<image002.jpg>
Change to lower case items in red
Phonak CROS P real ear measurement verification guide
Phonak At a Glance CROS P Move CROS to second line, so all one word
  • Create new section: Point of sale (add this under Datasheets)
Move CROS P poster to POS
  • Videos
Separate videos out, rename to:
CROS P in clinic
CROS P Phonak 5
Thanks,
Melinda
From: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Friday, 15 October 2021 11:07 AM
To: O'Brien, Melinda <Melinda.OBrien@phonak.com>
Subject: Re: CROS P launch 25 October 2021
EXTERNAL MAIL
Hi Melinda,
Here is the CROS P marketing catalogue ready for you to review:
https://phonakmarketing.com.au/cros-p-marketing-catalogue/
Regarding the videos, yes this will be fine, just send them through as soon as you receive them.
We can activate the CROS P tile on the main landing page once you approve.
Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au

<~WRD000.jpg>




On 14 Oct 2021, at 3:32 pm, O'Brien, Melinda <Melinda.OBrien@phonak.com> wrote:
Hi Heath,
Hope you are well.
Please see attached spreadsheet with CROS P items listed. As mentioned below, I would like CROS P to have its own page and will require the following listings:
Professional brochures
Consumer brochures
Datasheets
Images
Videos
Thanks,
Melinda
From: O'Brien, Melinda
Sent: Wednesday, 6 October 2021 9:55 PM
To: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: CROS P launch 25 October 2021
Hi Heath,
We have another launch coming up, it's the extension of S3 launch. CROS P has finally been approved and we are launching it on 25 October 2021.
Launch site:
The reps will be recording short videos that we would like to have available on the launch website. Can we please included on the livestream page. The current info for S3 will have endorsements extended for another 3 months on top of what it already had.
I was thinking we could move the original recording down and give it a heading, ActiveVent and Serenity Choice Plus launch. Then have the new short videos sit above it with the heading CROS P.
Can you please advise what you require from me to get this moving and built, also when you will require the videos by. I have given the reps the date of the 14 October to have them to me, we will then need to edit and add a start and finish to each of the videos. I think there will be 5 videos in total.
Digital Catalogue:
I am currently working on the items to upload to showpad to send you the links and list of items to include.
We would like CROS P to have its own page, can you please add CROS P to the space where Roger is(keep the new tab).
Move the Roger tab down next to Marvel.
Move Point of Sale down to bottom row.
<image006.jpg>
Regards,

Melinda O'Brien
Phonak Marketing Manager
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sonova Australia Pty Ltd
12 Inglewood Place, Norwest NSW 2153 Australia
Phone: +61 2 8858 1800
Direct: +61 2 8858 5564 Mob: +61 409 076 220
Email: melinda.obrien@phonak.com
Internet: www.phonak.com.au
